name: Rajpur Heights Residency

name: Clement Town Villa
detail: Spacious villa near Graphic Era University, surrounded by greenery. Perfect for students and families alike.

detail: Luxury high-rise apartments in Jakhan, close to Pacific Mall with premium amenities and rooftop gardens.

detail: Elegant apartments in Ballupur with close access to schools, hospitals, and central market.
